function.name: xmlRegisterXPathFunction
function.info: Register a Python written function to the XPath interpreter

return.info: 1 in case of success, 0 or -1 in case of error

function.name: xmlNewNode
function.info: Create a new Node

function.name: xmlCreatePushParser
function.info: Create a progressive XML parser context to build either an event flow if the SAX object is not None, or a DOM tree otherwise.

return.info: the parser context or None in case of error

arg.name: SAX
arg.info: the SAX callback object or None

arg.name: size
arg.info: the size of the initial data

arg.name: URI
arg.info: The URI used for base computations

function.name: htmlCreatePushParser
function.info: Create a progressive HTML parser context to build either an event flow if the SAX object is not None, or a DOM tree otherwise.

return.info: the parser context or None in case of error

arg.name: SAX
arg.info: the SAX callback object or None

arg.name: size
arg.info: the size of the initial data

arg.name: URI
arg.info: The URI used for base computations

function.name: xmlSAXParseFile
function.info: Interface to parse an XML file or resource pointed by an URI to build an event flow to the SAX object

arg.name: SAX
arg.info: the SAX callback object or None

arg.name: recover
arg.info: allow recovery in case of error

function.name: htmlSAXParseFile
function.info: Interface to parse an HTML file or resource pointed by an URI to build an event flow to the SAX object

arg.name: SAX
arg.info: the SAX callback object or None

function.name: xmlCreateOutputBuffer
function.info: Create a libxml2 output buffer from a Python file

function.name: xmlCreateInputBuffer
function.info: Create a libxml2 input buffer from a Python file

function.name: xmlSetEntityLoader
function.info: Set the entity resolver as a python function

return.info: 0 in case of success, -1 for error

function.name: xmlParserGetDoc
function.info: Get the document tree from a parser context.

function.name: xmlParserGetWellFormed
function.info: Get the well formed information from a parser context.

function.name: xmlParserGetIsValid
function.info: Get the validity information from a parser context.

function.name: xmlParserSetValidate
function.info: Switch the parser to validation mode.

function.name: xmlParserSetReplaceEntities
function.info: Switch the parser to replace entities.

function.name: xmlParserSetPedantic
function.info: Switch the parser to be pedantic.

function.name: xmlParserSetLoadSubset
function.info: Switch the parser to load the DTD without validating.

function.name: xmlParserSetLineNumbers
function.info: Switch on the generation of line number for elements nodes.

function.name: xmlDebugMemory
function.info: Switch on the generation of line number for elements nodes. Also returns the number of bytes allocated and not freed by libxml2 since memory debugging was switched on.

return.info: returns the number of bytes allocated and not freed

arg.name: activate
arg.info: 1 switch on memory debugging 0 switch it off

function.name: xmlDumpMemory
function.info: dump the memory allocated in the file .memdump

function.name: xmlNodeGetNs
function.info: Get the namespace of a node

function.name: xmlNodeGetNsDefs
function.info: Get the namespace of a node

function.name: xmlXPathParserGetContext
function.info: Get the xpathContext from an xpathParserContext

function.name: xmlXPathGetContextDoc
function.info: Get the doc from an xpathContext

function.name: xmlXPathGetContextNode
function.info: Get the current node from an xpathContext

function.name: xmlXPathSetContextDoc
function.info: Set the doc of an xpathContext

function.name: xmlXPathSetContextNode
function.info: Set the current node of an xpathContext

function.name: xmlXPathGetContextPosition
function.info: Get the current node from an xpathContext

function.name: xmlXPathGetContextSize
function.info: Get the current node from an xpathContext

function.name: xmlXPathGetFunction
function.info: Get the current function name xpathContext

function.name: xmlXPathGetFunctionURI
function.info: Get the current function name URI xpathContext

function.name: xmlURIGetScheme
function.info: Get the scheme part from an URI

function.name: xmlURISetScheme
function.info: Set the scheme part of an URI.

function.name: xmlURIGetOpaque
function.info: Get the opaque part from an URI

function.name: xmlURISetOpaque
function.info: Set the opaque part of an URI.

function.name: xmlURIGetAuthority
function.info: Get the authority part from an URI

function.name: xmlURISetAuthority
function.info: Set the authority part of an URI.

function.name: xmlURIGetServer
function.info: Get the server part from an URI

function.name: xmlURISetServer
function.info: Set the server part of an URI.

function.name: xmlURIGetUser
function.info: Get the user part from an URI

function.name: xmlURISetUser
function.info: Set the user part of an URI.

function.name: xmlURIGetPath
function.info: Get the path part from an URI

function.name: xmlURISetPath
function.info: Set the path part of an URI.

function.name: xmlURIGetQuery
function.info: Get the query part from an URI

function.name: xmlURISetQuery
function.info: Set the query part of an URI.

function.name: xmlURIGetFragment
function.info: Get the fragment part from an URI

function.name: xmlURISetFragment
function.info: Set the fragment part of an URI.

function.name: xmlURIGetPort
function.info: Get the port part from an URI

function.name: xmlURISetPort
function.info: Set the port part of an URI.

function.name: xmlErrorGetDomain
function.info: What part of the library raised this error

function.name: xmlErrorGetCode
function.info: The error code, e.g. an xmlParserError

function.name: xmlErrorGetMessage
function.info: human-readable informative error message

function.name: xmlErrorGetLevel
function.info: how consequent is the error

function.name: xmlErrorGetFile
function.info: the filename

function.name: xmlErrorGetLine
function.info: the line number if available

function.name: xmlPythonCleanupParser
function.info: Cleanup function for the XML library. It tries to reclaim all parsing related global memory allocated for the library processing. It doesn't deallocate any document related memory. Calling this function should not prevent reusing the library but one should call xmlCleanupParser() only when the process has finished using the library or XML document built with it.

function.name: xmlMemoryUsed
function.info: Returns the total amount of memory allocated by libxml2
